trans-unit.source: Follow these guidelines to prepare your app's packages for submission to the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Follow these guidelines to prepare your app's packages for submission to the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: App package requirements
trans-unit.target: App package requirements

trans-unit.source: App package requirements
trans-unit.target: App package requirements

trans-unit.source: Follow these guidelines to prepare your app's packages for submission to the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Follow these guidelines to prepare your app's packages for submission to the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: Before you build your app's package for the Windows Store
trans-unit.target: Before you build your app's package for the Windows Store

trans-unit.source: Make sure to [test your app with the Windows App Certification Kit](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt186449).
trans-unit.target: Make sure to [test your app with the Windows App Certification Kit](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt186449).

trans-unit.source: We also recommend that you test your app on different types of hardware.
trans-unit.target: We also recommend that you test your app on different types of hardware.

trans-unit.source: Note that until we certify your app and make it available from the Windows Store, it can only be installed and run on computers that have developer licenses.
trans-unit.target: Note that until we certify your app and make it available from the Windows Store, it can only be installed and run on computers that have developer licenses.

trans-unit.source: Building the app package using Microsoft Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Building the app package using Microsoft Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: If you're using Microsoft Visual Studio as your development environment, you already have built-in tools that make creating an app package a quick and easy process.
trans-unit.target: If you're using Microsoft Visual Studio as your development environment, you already have built-in tools that make creating an app package a quick and easy process.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Packaging apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt270969).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Packaging apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt270969).

trans-unit.source: **Note** Be sure that all your filenames use ANSI.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Be sure that all your filenames use ANSI.

trans-unit.source: When you create your package in Visual Studio, make sure you are signed in with the same Microsoft account associated with your developer account.
trans-unit.target: When you create your package in Visual Studio, make sure you are signed in with the same Microsoft account associated with your developer account.

trans-unit.source: Some parts of the package manifest have specific details related to your account.
trans-unit.target: Some parts of the package manifest have specific details related to your account.

trans-unit.source: This info is detected and added automatically.
trans-unit.target: This info is detected and added automatically.

trans-unit.source: When you build your app's packages, Visual Studio can create an .appx file or an .appxupload file (or a .xap file for Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier).
trans-unit.target: When you build your app's packages, Visual Studio can create an .appx file or an .appxupload file (or a .xap file for Windows Phone 8.1 and earlier).

trans-unit.source: For apps that target Windows 10, always upload the .appxupload file in the [Packages](upload-app-packages.md) page.
trans-unit.target: For apps that target Windows 10, always upload the .appxupload file in the [Packages](upload-app-packages.md) page.

trans-unit.source: For more info about packaging UWP apps for the Store, see [Packaging Universal Windows apps for Windows 10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=620193 ).
trans-unit.target: For more info about packaging UWP apps for the Store, see [Packaging Universal Windows apps for Windows 10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=620193 ).

trans-unit.source: Your app's packages don't have to be signed with a certificate rooted in a trusted certificate authority.
trans-unit.target: Your app's packages don't have to be signed with a certificate rooted in a trusted certificate authority.

trans-unit.source: App bundles
trans-unit.target: App bundles

trans-unit.source: For apps that target Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1, and later, Visual Studio can generate an app bundle (.appxbundle) to reduce the size of the app that users download.
trans-unit.target: For apps that target Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1, and later, Visual Studio can generate an app bundle (.appxbundle) to reduce the size of the app that users download.

trans-unit.source: This can be helpful if you've defined language-specific assets, a variety of image-scale assets, or resources that apply to specific versions of Microsoft DirectX.
trans-unit.target: This can be helpful if you've defined language-specific assets, a variety of image-scale assets, or resources that apply to specific versions of Microsoft DirectX.

trans-unit.source: **Note** One app bundle can contain your packages for all architectures.
trans-unit.target: **Note** One app bundle can contain your packages for all architectures.

trans-unit.source: You should submit only one bundle for each targeted OS.
trans-unit.target: You should submit only one bundle for each targeted OS.

trans-unit.source: With an app bundle, a user will only download the relevant files, rather than all possible resources.
trans-unit.target: With an app bundle, a user will only download the relevant files, rather than all possible resources.

trans-unit.source: For more info about app bundles, see [Packaging apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt270969) and [Packaging Universal Windows apps for Windows 10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=620193 ).
trans-unit.target: For more info about app bundles, see [Packaging apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt270969) and [Packaging Universal Windows apps for Windows 10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=620193 ).

trans-unit.source: Building the app package manually
trans-unit.target: Building the app package manually

trans-unit.source: If you don't use Visual Studio to create your package, you must [create your package manifest manually](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br211476).
trans-unit.target: If you don't use Visual Studio to create your package, you must [create your package manifest manually](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br211476).

trans-unit.source: Be sure to review the [App package manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br211474) documentation for complete manifest details and requirements.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to review the [App package manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br211474) documentation for complete manifest details and requirements.

trans-unit.source: Your manifest must follow the package manifest schema in order to pass certification.
trans-unit.target: Your manifest must follow the package manifest schema in order to pass certification.

trans-unit.source: Your manifest must include some specific info about your account and your app.
trans-unit.target: Your manifest must include some specific info about your account and your app.

trans-unit.source: You can find this info by looking at [View app identity details](view-app-identity-details.md) in the **App management** section of your app's overview page in the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can find this info by looking at [View app identity details](view-app-identity-details.md) in the **App management** section of your app's overview page in the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Values in the manifest are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Values in the manifest are case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: Spaces and other punctuation must also match.
trans-unit.target: Spaces and other punctuation must also match.

trans-unit.source: Enter the values carefully and review them to ensure that they are correct.
trans-unit.target: Enter the values carefully and review them to ensure that they are correct.

trans-unit.source: App bundles use a different manifest.
trans-unit.target: App bundles use a different manifest.

trans-unit.source: Review the [Bundle manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263089) documentation for the details and requirements for app bundle manifests.
trans-unit.target: Review the [Bundle manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263089) documentation for the details and requirements for app bundle manifests.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** Be sure to run the [Windows App Certification Kit](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt186449) before you submit your packages.
trans-unit.target: **Tip** Be sure to run the [Windows App Certification Kit](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt186449) before you submit your packages.

trans-unit.source: This can you help determine if your manifest has any problems that might cause certification or submission failures.
trans-unit.target: This can you help determine if your manifest has any problems that might cause certification or submission failures.

trans-unit.source: If your app has more than one package, these app manifest elements must be the same in each package (per targeted OS):
trans-unit.target: If your app has more than one package, these app manifest elements must be the same in each package (per targeted OS):

trans-unit.source: Package/Capabilities
trans-unit.target: Package/Capabilities

trans-unit.source: Package/Dependencies
trans-unit.target: Package/Dependencies

trans-unit.source: Package/Resources
trans-unit.target: Package/Resources

trans-unit.source: Package format requirements
trans-unit.target: Package format requirements

trans-unit.source: Your app’s packages must comply with these requirements.
trans-unit.target: Your app’s packages must comply with these requirements.

trans-unit.source: App package property
trans-unit.target: App package property

trans-unit.source: Requirement
trans-unit.target: Requirement

trans-unit.source: Package size
trans-unit.target: Package size

trans-unit.source: .appxbundle: 25 GB maximum per bundle
trans-unit.target: .appxbundle: 25 GB maximum per bundle

trans-unit.source: .appx packages targeting Windows 8.1: 8 GB maximum per package
trans-unit.target: .appx packages targeting Windows 8.1: 8 GB maximum per package

trans-unit.source: .appx packages targeting Windows 8: 2 GB maximum per package
trans-unit.target: .appx packages targeting Windows 8: 2 GB maximum per package

trans-unit.source: .appx packages targeting Windows Phone 8.1: 4 GB maximum per package
trans-unit.target: .appx packages targeting Windows Phone 8.1: 4 GB maximum per package

trans-unit.source: .xap packages: 1 GB maximum per package
trans-unit.target: .xap packages: 1 GB maximum per package

trans-unit.source: Block map hashes
trans-unit.target: Block map hashes

trans-unit.source: SHA2-256 algorithm
trans-unit.target: SHA2-256 algorithm

trans-unit.source: StoreManifest XML file
trans-unit.target: StoreManifest XML file

trans-unit.source: StoreManifest.xml is an optional configuration file that may be included in app packages.
trans-unit.target: StoreManifest.xml is an optional configuration file that may be included in app packages.

trans-unit.source: Its purpose is to enable features, such as declaring your app as a Windows Store device app or declaring requirements that a package depends on to be applicable to a device, that the package manifest does not cover.
trans-unit.target: Its purpose is to enable features, such as declaring your app as a Windows Store device app or declaring requirements that a package depends on to be applicable to a device, that the package manifest does not cover.

trans-unit.source: StoreManifest.xml is submitted with the app package and must be in the root folder of your app's main project.
trans-unit.target: StoreManifest.xml is submitted with the app package and must be in the root folder of your app's main project.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [StoreManifest schema](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt617325).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [StoreManifest schema](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt617325).
